title: Corporate Radar: Muthoot Finance to trade ex-dividend, Mahindra CIE's AGM and more - Economic Times
content: Corporate Radar: Muthoot Finance to trade ex-dividend, Mahindra CIE's AGM and more  Economic Times
description: Shares of Leading NBFC Muthoot Finance will trade ex-dividend today as the company had announced a dividend of Rs 20.
